name: Twitter NFT Profile Picture
description:
Can’t afford an NFT but don’t want to be left out? Create your very own hexagonal Twitter NFT profile picture in Figma for free! 


  1.  Add your image to the hexagonal layer. 
  2. Change the background color to match your Twitter interface. 
  3. Export @1x or larger! 


-

Jello (@madewithjello)


What's new?


Jun 13, 2022:

  1. Added the new Twitter Spaces icon.


Jan 26, 2022:

  1. Added multiple layouts including going LIVE with Twitter Spaces.
